name: Hyper Dragon Ball Z
description:
Team Z2 is proud to announce the next official update to our from-fans-to-fans fighting game built on the MUGEN engine - Hyper Dragon Ball Z!
Current Main Hyper DBZ  dev team is: Balthazar, Iced, Just No Point, XGargoyle, Daeron, Barker, AlexSin, HQ and of course Cybaster
If you want to support the ongoing project, if only for a little bit, please concider becoming one of Balthazar's Patreons:      https://www.patreon.com/TheBalthazar
Or for a single donation:     http://network.mugenguild.com/balthazar/paypal.html
´Official´ Hyper DBZ Facebook:     https://www.facebook.com/HyperDBZ/
'Official' Hyper DBZ Twitter:     https://twitter.com/z2_team
Mugen Fighters Guild:        http://mugenguild.com/forum/hyper-dbz.412
Patreon:      https://www.patreon.com/TheBalthazar
Twitter:     https://twitter.com/
Discord:     https://discord.gg/3YrQZtw

Disclaimer:
Hyper Dragon Ball Z is a non-profit fan game, made by fans for fans. If you ever had to click a AD.fly link or pay for it, you are being fooled! Follow us at Mugenguild.com
Dragon Ball is copyright of Akira Toryama and TOEI TV. Please support the official releases!
A big thanks to Capcom, Namco, Akira toryama and many others without which this game wouldn't be possible.
And last but not least, a special thanks to YOU, for your continued support!
